extension.name: JUserTube Package
extension.author: Md. Afzal Hossain
extension.license: GNU General Public License version 2 or later
extension.description: Package for installing JUserTube Component and Module. It also includes a plugin called srizonmodifier which helps you to remove unwanted script/css or add new one. The plugin is provided for resolving multiple jQuery or jQuery Mootools problem
